sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react'; export default function App() { const trains=[ {id:'t1',nom:'Buraq',villes:[]}, {id:'t2',nom:'Gazel', villes:[]}, {id:'t3',nom:'Eagle-Wins', villes:[]}, {id:'t4',nom:'Fennec', villes:[]}, ] const [id,setId]=useState() const [train,setTrain]=useState([]) const [ville,setVille]=useState() function rechercher(){ setTrain(trains.find((t)=> t.id===id)) } function ajouter_ville(){ train.villes.push({vil:ville}) setVille((prev)=>({ ...prev,villes:train.villes })) } return (

Gestion des trains

Id Train setId(e.target.value)} className='form-control' style={{width:'60%'}}/>
Nom
Ville Depart 0?train.villes[0]:''} readOnly/>
Ville terminus 0?train.villes[train.villes.length-1]:''} readOnly/>
Nouvelle ville de passage
) }
